summary: This document is a staff schedule report from August 12, 2019, detailing work schedules and statuses for three Metropolitan Correctional Center employees, including two correctional officers and a warehouse worker foreman. It notes that two employees had not returned to work, while one was scheduled to return that day.

persons.name: NOEL
persons.context: Correctional officer at Metropolitan Correctional Center, scheduled off Monday/Tuesday, works 4pm to 12am, and had not returned to work as of the report date.

persons.name: THOMAS
persons.context: Correctional officer at Metropolitan Correctional Center, scheduled off Wednesday/Thursday, works 2pm to 10pm, and was scheduled to return to work on the report date at 2pm.

events.title: Staff schedule report and status update
events.description: A staff schedule report was generated detailing work schedules and return-to-work statuses for three Metropolitan Correctional Center employees.

keyFacts: The document is a staff schedule report dated August 12, 2019, from the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
Two correctional officers (NOEL and THOMAS) and one warehouse worker foreman (MI) are listed with their work schedules and statuses.
NOEL and MI had not returned to work as of the report date, while THOMAS was scheduled to return that day at 2pm.
The report appears to be a routine administrative document related to staff scheduling and attendance.
